name: Bank Saman EDD gateway
author: Pouriya Amjadzadeh

sections.description:
This plugin will add Bank Saman gateway to easy digital downloads plugin

Features:

  • 100% Free.
  • Add Bank Samanand Shaparak Electronic Network gateway for selling files.
  • Change currency “RIAL” to “ریال” in persian language.
  • Add “Toman” currency.
  • Without any advertising.
  • Support Test Mode

Language Support:

  • Persian
  • English
  • Arabic

NOTE : before install this plugin, you should installed Easy Digital Downloads

Have any problem? Get in touch

Donations

You can Donate plugin author here https://pamjad.me/donate
sections.installation:
1. Install and active “EasyDigitalDownloads”.
  2. Upload ‘bank-saman-edd-gateway’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to ‘/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=download&page=edd-settings&tab=gateways’ and active Bank Saman
sections.changelog:
3.0

  • Plugin rewrite
  • Compatibility with the latest version of Easy Digital Downloads
  • Replaced nusoap With soap

2.0

  • Fixed payment form submit
  • Fixed payment data logs
  • Fixed load text domain problem

1.0

  • Fixing redirect problem.
  • Added Test Mode Support.
  • Rewrite functions from first
  • Added Arabic Language
